page.title: 05RECREATION
page.content: At the canoe camp we walked over to the tents, got our bags and put them in the instructors' cars. We then set off to a place on the River Lud where we could launch our canoes. We got the canoes off the trailer and put them on the grass near the river. We had to take them over the bridge and launch them on the other side. Everybody got into their boats and paddled down stream until we got to the locks. We had to pull the boats out of the water and put them in again on the other side. We kept paddling until the next lock and we had to walk around that. We canoed almost to Louth and then we ate our pack-ups. We had to sleep the night in our tents by the river and cook our own breakfast. We had bacon and eggs but mine was burnt. Then the next group came from school.
